description: This file defines an Angular component 'AdminFoliosRegistryComponent' that displays a registry of folios in a table with sortable columns. It fetches data from an AdminService and shows a list with title, analyst, visibility, and updated date.

classes.name: AdminFoliosRegistryComponent
classes.description: Angular component that displays a table of folios with sorting functionality, fetched via AdminService.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook initializing the component, fetches folios data and triggers initial sort.

methods.name: onSort
methods.description: Handles sorting when a table column header is clicked, updating the sort key and sorting data.

methods.name: sort
methods.description: Performs the sorting of the rows based on current sortKey.

ctags.name: k
ctags.pattern: /^    const k = this.sortKey as keyof (typeof this.rows)[number];$/
